description: Pun on 'waist of time' and wasting time.
title: Time Belt
n_1: Max shows off his new belt to Ben.
n_2: Ben looks confused at the collection of watches.
n_3: Max grins proudly, spinning his belt.
c1_3: Best timing device around my waist!
n_4: Max delivers the punchline with a laugh.
c1_4: Maybe, but it's just a waist of time!
c2_4: Oh, I see what you did there!
